assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Approved by Weill Cornell Medicine Institutional Review Board. Our study was reviewed by an institutional review board/human investigations committee/ethics committee (Weill Cornell Institutional Review Board) and approved as human subjects research.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All appropriate steps were taken in obtaining informed consent of all human subjects participating in the research comprising the manuscript submitted for publication. There is no identifying information. All study participants have given informed consent to be included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Kevin Holcomb serves as a consultant for Johnson and Johnson and receives research support from Fujirebio Diagnostics. None of the remaining authors have a conflict of interest to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
